Replace.Text: The present-day south-central region of the United States extends from Tennessee to the east, parts of northern Texas to the west, and Arkansas to the north.
Covering an area of ​​602,305 square kilometers

The [ICON_Governor] title effect of the inaugurated governor can be provided to other cities with the inaugurated governor of [ICON_Governor], and the effects provided to the own inaugurated city are doubled. [NEWLINE]However, the city where the governor takes office has -1 [ICON_Amenities] habitability; for every level of title the governor holds, the city where the governor takes office has an additional -1 [ICON_PressureDown] loyalty. [NEWLINE] Obtain 1/2/3 [ICON_Governor] governor titles from [Code]/[Political Philosophy]/[Administrative Department] respectively.

Qisi Kuang’s special unit: replaces [Stone Cannon], unlocked by [Diplomatic Department] [NEWLINE] Maintenance costs are lower and no strategic resources are required. But it can only be purchased with gold coins

Qisi Kuang's characteristic improvement facilities are limited to one in each city. It needs to be built on hilly terrain or cells with woods or rainforest landforms. [NEWLINE]+2 [ICON_Housing] housing. [NEWLINE] Enemy units adjacent to the Ferocious Totem have -5 [ICON_Strength] combat strength. Units in the same cell are considered garrisoned and gain +4 [ICON_Strength] combat strength when defending. [NEWLINE]Cell +2 [ICON_Faith] faith and [ICON_Culture] culture. Unlocking [Mysticism]/[Theology]/[Reformed Church] will gain an additional +1/+2/+3 [ICON_Faith] faith value and [ICON_Culture] culture value respectively.
To Wen Pei and Qi Tun
Never launch a surprise war or surrender, always try to maintain a large army, respect civilizations with large military forces, and despise civilizations with weak military forces.
Not bad, not bad. It is pleasing to the eye. Your warriors deserve appreciation.
You weak insect, please don’t appear in front of me again.

Use your iron fist to protect your hometown, Winpace Chitunwan. Your unswerving fighting spirit inspires your warriors to go all out on the battlefield and fight without danger! Break through all the haze hanging over the heads of your people, and then you can safely protect the prosperity and growth of your hometown. To this end, your close friends will also help you. Tempest, Mistress of Steel, the shade we can always rely on.

Land combat units: Ignore the [ICON_Strength] damage debuff when located on hills; if you suppress the enemy when attacking, you can drive the enemy 1 cell away, and additional damage will be added to the enemy if there is no way to retreat. (Remote strikes are also effective) [NEWLINE]Has the unique governor [Red Witch] Hong Ruici Apugai.
Ignores the [ICON_Strength] damage debuff when on a hill; banishes enemies when pinned.
Ignores the [ICON_Strength] damage debuff when on a hill; banishes enemies when pinned.
It has the special governor [Red Witch] Hongruici Apugai, who is helpful in diplomacy, war, construction and faith.
Yesterday I was a flat earther, today I am an agnostic, tomorrow I will be a geocentrist, and the day after tomorrow I will be an environmentally friendly vegetarian. [NEWLINE]——Hongruici Apugai
A heroine with an iron fist and an iron fist
Huh, Gui Rui Ruisu? He will never come back!

Tempest Chitunwan has always been regarded as a brave and capable female warrior. She has participated in many battles and saved her hometown from the attacks of the shocked Geiri Airesu and the colonists of Europe. property.

Chisikuang's governors are very good at cooperating and can provide each other with their unlocked title abilities. And the effect is doubled in the city where you work! However this will reduce the city's [ICON_Amenities] Amenability and [ICON_PressureDown] Loyalty. This is not usually fatal, but it is always an easy vulnerability to attack. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE] Tempest Chitunwan is a very good leader who can protect Qisi Kuang very well. At the same time, the additional governor she provides can not only provide additional effects to the city with the governor in conjunction with the civilization ability, but also provide you with more help. [NEWLINE] As an AI, Tempest is unlikely to launch a surprise war, but as a person who advocates force, she may still pose a threat to you. Maintaining enough troops is still a rational choice for self-protection.

Qisikuang's abilities revolve around the Governor. You can consider using spies to [frame the governor] and combat Qisi Kuang's operations. [NEWLINE] However, under the leadership of Wympeth Chitunwan, their military strength cannot be underestimated. Land combat units can not only drive away enemies with melee attacks like Polish Hussars, but also have long-range attacks. If the enemy is cornered, they will even receive additional damage! [NEWLINE] If you want to solve the Chisimaniac problem by force, try to avoid units being cornered by Wimperth Chitunwan, try to ensure that the units are pushed back in a position that is conducive to your strategy, and use the spy to attack Chisimania ability. But it would be better to launch a subversive action on the issue of Qi Si Kuang's loyalty.
Tempest Qitunwan, the war matron and the chieftain of Qisikuang, stands in front of you. If you have something to say, say it!
You want to come and sit with us, right? Isn't it just to see the world when I go this far?
You need to teach me your language well.
Exchange it and put the address of the settlement? Do you want to?
Then accept me and give you a gift in return next time.
Gift. What our delegation brings to you, and what comes to all of you.
You can contact our delegation if you have any questions.
Tsk, give it to the shameless red guy...
Establishing diplomatic relations with an embassy is very important and you should consider it carefully.
It's a sign of friendship, I believe.
Is this going against us, so?
I won't take it lightly when I'm watching you. Let's go.
If you want to get past us, open the border.
Agreed, drink this dish of social bar, we.
No, no, no, I said it!
Are you willing to drink this dish of social wine together? you and me.
Making a covenant is very important, both to you and to me.
Want to do a raid? I've seen it all, either your people get out, or you give us a good fight!
Did you do it on purpose? I'll teach you a lesson sooner or later, you brat!
How can an insect like you protect your hometown? [NEWLINE](condemn you)
Hum, I will make sure you never come back!
Stop talking nonsense and let the fight begin!
You trash, I will spare you this time, temporarily.
Go away, hold your weapon steady!
Hong Ruici has a kind face and wisdom accumulated over time. She is helpful in diplomacy, war, construction, and faith.

It only takes 3 turns to take up the city. [NEWLINE]The city's improvements, buildings, and areas are protected from natural disasters. [NEWLINE]Settlers produced in cities do not count towards the [ICON_Citizen] population.
Allied units within ten tiles of the city of employment gain +2 [ICON_Movement] movement. [NEWLINE]The attack level of other civilization spies in the inaugurated city is -2.

When dispatched to the capital of a major civilization [ICON_Capital], cause it to decay by an additional 3 points if it is dissatisfied with your [ICON_STAT_GRIEVANCE]. [NEWLINE]For all overlord's city-states, their units have +4 [ICON_Strength] combat strength (including levied units).
The inaugural city can build an additional specialized area regardless of the [ICON_Citizen] population. [NEWLINE]All cities gain +3 [ICON_Faith] Faith.
Military units produced or purchased by the inauguration city, +1 level [ICON_Promotion] promotion. [NEWLINE]The time required to build a Holy Land has been cut in half.
Once inaugurated, all cities can use [ICON_Faith] faith to purchase civilian units.

According to the remaining records of Keluoqiya, when the reporter at that time interviewed Hongruici Apugai, the religious leader of the Teng Taoism in Chisi Kuang, she told us a legend from a Western traveler. Legend has it that a group of people who looked very similar to them came from the far west, but their skin was faster and whiter. They claimed to be from the "Song" tribe and the "Ni Peng" tribe respectively (it is speculated that they should have arrived from the east at that time). people from the Chinese Song Dynasty and the Japanese) and brought novel knowledge to the tribe. Although some people later left, others chose to stay. Through repeated cultural integration, an organized religion that mixed local totem beliefs, Taoism, and Shintoism was born. This was the original Teng Taoism. prototype. Later, with the arrival of Europeans, this religion was integrated into Christian culture.

The city has no war weariness, and units adjacent to the river have +4 [ICON_Strength] combat strength. [NEWLINE] Each military unit provides +1 [ICON_Gold] gold coins to the capital. After unlocking [Military Training]/[Mercenary]/[Nationalism]/[Mobilization], each will provide an additional +1 [ICON_Gold] gold coin.
Jingkansheng’s special unit: replaces [Warrior], has higher [ICON_Movement] mobility, and slightly lower construction cost.

Jingkansheng characteristic area: replaces [Military Camp] and is unlocked by [Code]. Constant 27 cost, no greatness points provided, not part of the specialization area. [NEWLINE]+4 [ICON_Housing] Housing. [NEWLINE]Each military unit produced in the city provides the capital with +1 [ICON_Gold] gold.
If you can't be punished for being a child, you will always be a child. [NEWLINE]——Gui Rui Ruisu

Tends to clear barbarian strongholds, plunder, and declare war by surprise. [NEWLINE] Like to clear out barbarian villages and civilizations in a state of war? I hate civilizations that are at peace without clearing out barbarian villages.

I beg you, Lord Giri Aerisu, please do not capture me and serve you for the rest of my life. We all know how well you know how to use people. In order for them to work correctly in the right position, you can spur your thugs to pursue them all the way. Anyone who dares to stop them will stimulate their motivation to move forward - what can be better than Is your punishment more terrible?

All military units: After winning the battle, they immediately recover [ICON_Movement] mobility with the units in the same formation and are allowed to attack again; winning the battle provides 4 [ICON_GreatPerson] great points of all types. [NEWLINE]Every time [ICON_GreatPerson] is used, the city it owns will have +1 output of the corresponding type.

After winning the battle, the [ICON_Movement] mobility will be restored immediately together with the units in the same formation, and allowed to attack again; winning the battle will provide 4 points of all types of greatness points.

After winning the battle, the [ICON_Movement] mobility will be restored immediately together with the units in the same formation, and allowed to attack again; winning the battle will provide 4 points of all types of greatness points.
From civilization ability: Provides [ICON_Gold] gold coins to the capital.
From civilization ability: Provides [ICON_Gold] gold coins to the capital.
From the Featured Area: Provides [ICON_Gold] gold coins to the capital.
From the Featured Area: Provides [ICON_Gold] gold coins to the capital.
Meals need to be eaten one bite at a time, so I only eat one bite at each meal - I eat at least one thousand and one meals a day.
The leader of Jingkansheng, known for his rule of terror and his ability to make good use of people, was born with heterochromatic eyes.

The Jingkan people are so enthusiastic about the [ICON_Gold] war that they are even willing to pay taxes to join the army. The river can also bring them strength. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE] Under the leadership of Gui Rui Eresu, Jingkansheng's military units can gain additional actions through victory in battle, which is very flexible. At the same time, they can also gain great man points from winning battles and looting, and use great men to provide output for the city. [NEWLINE] You'd better completely annihilate the Jingkan students as AI, they are simply a group of barbarians disguised as civilization!

The mere presence of Jingkansheng's military units will provide [ICON_Gold] to the capital, without wasting too much time on looting. [NEWLINE] Under the rule of Guirui Elesu, every battle and plunder won can provide great people points to let the great people work for them. Even if the great people have retired, Guirui can make them admire. The city where the city is born provides the corresponding type of output bonus. [NEWLINE] On the battlefield, once Gui Rui seizes a breakthrough and annihilates one of your troops, the victorious troops can attack again, which is very fatal in the decisive battlefield! [NEWLINE]You cannot allow such a barbaric empire to grow wildly, and annihilating this civilization at all costs will be your top priority.
Let me see who is here? Oh~ Isn’t this that person over there? After all, uncle, I have never heard of your name, but today you have this opportunity to introduce yourself.
I look forward to your visit. Why not show you the way? goodbye.
It sounds like a very wealthy place... Haha, come on, let me take a look!
Tell me the location of your capital. As for the small rule of exchanging capital location information, I am still happy to follow it.
Huh, this favor... I'll accept it, sir.
Hey, sir, how about I give you a little gift in return - a wine cup made of skulls made by your delegation?
Don't get excited, I am here today only for one thing, and that is to give you a little sweetness...
Yes, you know the general picture.
While I am still willing to play games with you, hurry up and allocate a piece of land for me to build an embassy!
Yes, you know the general picture.
Haha, there are consequences at your own risk.
Oops, this floor is too rough... huh? Did you just say something?
Uncle, I don’t mind entering your territory directly, but you have to abide by some rules when playing games, otherwise it won’t be fun, right?
Hee hee hee...you are so brave!
Uncle, I’m here this time for one thing: fuck with me, otherwise I’ll look good with you.
Uncle, I’m here this time for one thing: fuck with me, otherwise I’ll look good with you.
Only by recuperating can you create wealth, right?
Okay, okay, great! You saved all your wealth, right?
Oh, war, I am just and will not sit idly by and watch ~
Hey, hey, hey, it's really sad to let outsiders ravage and rob you of all your wealth.

Uncle, I have always been very sensitive, and I can often detect various emotions in people’s hearts—— [NEWLINE]I can detect joy, anger, sadness, joy...even murderous intent. [NEWLINE]——So don’t try to play tricks in front of me, Gui Rui Ruisu, do you understand?
Oops, this throwing spear is too much of a throwing spear...huh? Did you just say something?
Did I let you speak? [NEWLINE](condemn you)
Haha... Dare you do something? Good boy, I appreciate you.
Today, I am here only for two things: one is to ask you to pay taxes, and the other is to purchase goods from you - I want a new batch of skull wine cups!
Yes, I understand the general idea, so I will let you go this time.
Today, I am very merciful... I will reward you with my prey.
Haha...you can't catch me...immerse yourself in the fear that I will return at any time...
Haha...you can't catch me...immerse yourself in the fear that I will return at any time...
